body:
This fails consistently on MySQL 5.6: 
```
--- FAIL: TestStatements (0.98s)
##[error]    vstreamer_flaky_test.go:1140: Received events: [type:BEGIN timestamp:1576266391 current_time:1576266391774990563  type:FIELD timestamp:1576266391 field_event:<table_name:"stream1" fields:<name:"id" type:INT32 > fields:<name:"val" type:VARBINARY > > current_time:1576266391775013163  type:ROW timestamp:1576266391 row_event:<table_name:"stream1" row_changes:<after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1aaa" > > > current_time:1576266391775018963  type:ROW timestamp:1576266391 row_event:<table_name:"stream1" row_changes:<before:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1aaa" > after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1bbb" > > > current_time:1576266391775025163  type:GTID timestamp:1576266391 gtid:"MySQL56/421bd9c8-1de1-11ea-ab08-000d3a54501b:1-31" current_time:1576266391775031563  type:COMMIT timestamp:1576266391 current_time:1576266391775031663 ]
##[error]    vstreamer_flaky_test.go:1140: Received events: [type:GTID timestamp:1576266391 gtid:"MySQL56/421bd9c8-1de1-11ea-ab08-000d3a54501b:1-32" current_time:1576266391780552567  type:DDL timestamp:1576266391 ddl:"alter table stream1 change column val val varbinary(128)" current_time:1576266391780552667 ]
##[error]    vstreamer_flaky_test.go:1140: Received events: [type:GTID timestamp:1576266391 gtid:"MySQL56/421bd9c8-1de1-11ea-ab08-000d3a54501b:1-33" current_time:1576266391790787776  type:DDL timestamp:1576266391 ddl:"/* prefix */ alter table stream1 change column val val varbinary(256) /* suffix */" current_time:1576266391790787876 ]
##[error]    vstreamer_flaky_test.go:1140: Received events: [type:BEGIN timestamp:1576266391 current_time:1576266391793141678  type:FIELD timestamp:1576266391 field_event:<table_name:"stream1" fields:<name:"id" type:INT32 > fields:<name:"val" type:VARBINARY > > current_time:1576266391793168178  type:ROW timestamp:1576266391 row_event:<table_name:"stream1" row_changes:<after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"2bbb" > > > current_time:1576266391793173678  type:FIELD timestamp:1576266391 field_event:<table_name:"stream2" fields:<name:"id" type:INT32 > fields:<name:"val" type:VARBINARY > > current_time:1576266391793183678  type:ROW timestamp:1576266391 row_event:<table_name:"stream2" row_changes:<after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1aaa" > > > current_time:1576266391793186578  type:ROW timestamp:1576266391 row_event:<table_name:"stream1" row_changes:<before:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1bbb" > after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1ccc" > > row_changes:<before:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"2bbb" > after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"2ccc" > > > current_time:1576266391793195078  type:ROW timestamp:1576266391 row_event:<table_name:"stream1" row_changes:<before:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1ccc" > > row_changes:<before:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"2ccc" > > > current_time:1576266391793200778  type:GTID timestamp:1576266391 gtid:"MySQL56/421bd9c8-1de1-11ea-ab08-000d3a54501b:1-34" current_time:1576266391793516978  type:COMMIT timestamp:1576266391 current_time:1576266391793517178 ]
##[error]    vstreamer_flaky_test.go:1140: Received events: [type:GTID timestamp:1576266391 gtid:"MySQL56/421bd9c8-1de1-11ea-ab08-000d3a54501b:1-35" current_time:1576266391801429184  type:DDL timestamp:1576266391 ddl:"truncate table stream2" current_time:1576266391801429284 ]
##[error]    vstreamer_flaky_test.go:1140: Received events: [type:GTID timestamp:1576266391 gtid:"MySQL56/421bd9c8-1de1-11ea-ab08-000d3a54501b:1-36" current_time:1576266391802781885  type:OTHER timestamp:1576266391 current_time:1576266391802782085 ]
##[error]    vstreamer_flaky_test.go:1140: Received events: [type:GTID timestamp:1576266391 gtid:"MySQL56/421bd9c8-1de1-11ea-ab08-000d3a54501b:1-37" current_time:1576266391809166291  type:OTHER timestamp:1576266391 current_time:1576266391809166391 ]
##[error]    vstreamer_flaky_test.go:1140: Received events: [type:GTID timestamp:1576266391 gtid:"MySQL56/421bd9c8-1de1-11ea-ab08-000d3a54501b:1-38" current_time:1576266391810202791  type:OTHER timestamp:1576266391 current_time:1576266391810202891 ]
##[error]    vstreamer_flaky_test.go:1140: Received events: [type:BEGIN timestamp:1576266391 current_time:1576266391813490294  type:FIELD timestamp:1576266391 field_event:<table_name:"stream1" fields:<name:"id" type:INT32 > fields:<name:"val" type:VARBINARY > > current_time:1576266391813520894  type:ROW timestamp:1576266391 row_event:<table_name:"stream1" row_changes:<after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1aaa" > > > current_time:1576266391813528394  type:ROW timestamp:1576266391 row_event:<table_name:"stream1" row_changes:<before:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1aaa" > after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1bbb" > > > current_time:1576266391813549194  type:GTID timestamp:1576266391 gtid:"FilePos/mysql-bin.000001:8549" current_time:1576266391813564794  type:COMMIT timestamp:1576266391 current_time:1576266391813564894 ]
##[error]    vstreamer_flaky_test.go:1140: Received events: [type:HEARTBEAT timestamp:1576266392 current_time:1576266392713860520 ]
##[error]    vstreamer_flaky_test.go:148: alter table stream1 change column val val varbinary(128): evs
        [type:HEARTBEAT timestamp:1576266392 current_time:1576266392713860520 ], want
        [gtid type:DDL ddl:"alter table stream1 change column val val varbinary(128)" ]
E1213 19:46:32.913058   28032 vstreamer.go:648] stream error @ 421bd9c8-1de1-11ea-ab08-000d3a54501b:1-70: cannot determine table columns for ddl_test2: event has [3 15 15], schema as [{id INT32 false INT32(0)} {val1 VARBINARY false NULL}]
FAIL
FAIL	vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/vttablet/tabletserver/vstreamer	11.610s
```
title: Failing Unit Test: vt/vttablet/tabletserver/vstreamer on MySQL 5.6 and MariaDB 10.1
